sentences.sContent: I see the Russian soldiers standing on the threshold of their native land, guarding the fields which their fathers have tilled from time immemorial.
sentences.sContent_eng: I see the Russian soldiers standing on the threshold of their native land, guarding the fields which their fathers have tilled from time immemorial.
sentences.sCn: 我看见俄国士兵站在祖国的大门口，守卫着他们的祖先自远古以来劳作的土地。

synos.tran: 远古的，古老的；无法追忆的

phrases.pCn: 远古以来；太古时代；很久以前；法律不能追溯的年代

remMethod.val: im(不) + memor(记住) + ial → 在记忆之外的 → 太古的

trans.tranOther: starting longer ago than people can remember, or than written history shows
